title: Level 8, but website says I'm level 1.
body: It's preventing me from posting on the boards, which I'd very much like to do.

replies.body: It shows you as being level 8 to me.
Whether by default or the actions of a Red, it has indeed been changed to 8. Woot.
This is because your Boards and Summoner Profiles don't sync until you make a post, which luckily you can do at any level here on help & support. Happy posting!
